Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsIdentityNetwork

java.lang.Object
com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsIdentityNetwork
public final class HcsIdentityNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
Appnet's identity network based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.

  • Method Details

    • fromAddressBook

      public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromAddressBook​(java.lang.String network, AddressBook addressBook)
      Instantiates existing identity network from a provided address book.
      Parameters:
      network - The Hedera network.
      addressBook - The AddressBook of the identity network.
      Returns:
      The identity network instance.

    • fromAddressBookFile

      public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromAddressBookFile​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client, java.lang.String network, com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.FileId addressBookFileId) throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException, com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException
      Instantiates existing identity network using an address book file read from Hedera File Service.
      Parameters:
      client - The Hedera network client.
      network - The Hedera network.
      addressBookFileId - The FileID of AddressBook file stored on Hedera File Service.
      Returns:
      The identity network instance.
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - In the event the client is unable to connect to Hedera in a timely fashion
      com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException - If the query fails validation

    • fromHcsDid

      public static HcsIdentityNetwork fromHcsDid​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client, HcsDid hcsDid) throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException, com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException
      Instantiates existing identity network using a DID generated for this network.
      Parameters:
      client - The Hedera network client.
      hcsDid - The Hedera HCS DID.
      Returns:
      The identity network instance.
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - In the event the client is unable to connect to Hedera in a timely fashion
      com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException - If the query fails validation

      credentialHash - Credential hash.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • generateDid

      Generates a new DID from the given public DID root key.
      Parameters:
      publicKey - A DID root key.
      withTid - Indicates if DID topic ID should be added to the DID as tid parameter.
      Returns:
      A newly generated DID.

    • getVcStatusResolver

      public HcsVcStatusResolver getVcStatusResolver​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.util.Collection<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PublicKey>> publicKeysProvider)
      Returns a VC status resolver for this network. Resolver will validate signatures of topic messages against public keys supplied by the given provider.
      Parameters:
      publicKeysProvider - Provider of a public keys acceptable for a given VC hash.
      Returns:
      The VC status resolver for this network.

    • getVcTopicListener

      Returns:
      The VC topic listener.

    • getVcTopicListener

      public HcsVcTopicListener getVcTopicListener​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.util.Collection<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PublicKey>> publicKeysProvider)
      Returns a VC topic listener for this network. This listener will validate signatures of topic messages against public keys supplied by the given provider.
      Parameters:
      publicKeysProvider - Provider of a public keys acceptable for a given VC hash.
      Returns:
      The VC topic listener.
